extendedInfo.description: Published by HIT, it contains health information designed for women who use drugs, this leaflet provides health information about drugs, pregnancy, periods and contraception.It also gives specific information about how drugs may affect appetite, diet and energy levels.HIT was established in 1985 to reduce drug-related harm and set up one of the worldâs first HIV prevention projects for people who use drugs. It is one of the leading agencies in the world dealing with education, information and training about legal and illegal drugs.
